trans-unit.source: Learn how to monitor apps you deployed with Intune.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to monitor apps you deployed with Intune.

trans-unit.source: Monitor app deployments in Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Monitor app deployments in Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: You can see the apps that you manage and the status of any deployments in the Intune administration console.
trans-unit.target: You can see the apps that you manage and the status of any deployments in the Intune administration console.

trans-unit.source: To view apps that you manage and their status
trans-unit.target: To view apps that you manage and their status

trans-unit.source: In the **Apps** workspace, choose the **Apps** node, and then choose **Apps**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Apps** workspace, choose the **Apps** node, and then choose **Apps**.

trans-unit.source: The list of apps that you manage appears.
trans-unit.target: The list of apps that you manage appears.

trans-unit.source: You can choose any app to see an installation status in the lower pane of the console windows.
trans-unit.target: You can choose any app to see an installation status in the lower pane of the console windows.

trans-unit.source: Choose this status to see further details.
trans-unit.target: Choose this status to see further details.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the status shows **1 user has this software available**, you can choose the message to see the name of the user.
trans-unit.target: For example, if the status shows **1 user has this software available**, you can choose the message to see the name of the user.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Filters** drop-down list to show only apps that meet the criteria that you specify, like apps that failed to install or apps that were successfully deployed.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Filters** drop-down list to show only apps that meet the criteria that you specify, like apps that failed to install or apps that were successfully deployed.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the **Dashboard** workspace shows an overview of the status of your apps.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the **Dashboard** workspace shows an overview of the status of your apps.

trans-unit.source: If you click anywhere in the overview, you'll be taken to the list of apps.
trans-unit.target: If you click anywhere in the overview, you'll be taken to the list of apps.

trans-unit.source: To view more detailed information about an app
trans-unit.target: To view more detailed information about an app

trans-unit.source: In the list of apps, select any app, and then choose **View Properties**.
trans-unit.target: In the list of apps, select any app, and then choose **View Properties**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Software Properties** page for the app, choose one of these tabs: **General** - Shows general information about the app and its installation status, **Devices** - Shows the devices that successfully installed a targeted deployment of the app, and **Users** - Shows the users whose devices successfully installed a targeted deployment of the app.
trans-unit.target: On the **Software Properties** page for the app, choose one of these tabs: **General** - Shows general information about the app and its installation status, **Devices** - Shows the devices that successfully installed a targeted deployment of the app, and **Users** - Shows the users whose devices successfully installed a targeted deployment of the app.

trans-unit.source: As before, you can use the **Filters** drop-down list to configure the values shown on each of the tabs.
trans-unit.target: As before, you can use the **Filters** drop-down list to configure the values shown on each of the tabs.
